name: PID Temperature Controller, Digital Display K Type, MC901 Digital Programmable Temperature Control K Type PT100 Sensor Input Relay SSR Output
short_description: Control: The MC901 Digital PID Temperature Controller features a built-in chip that enhances sensitivity and accuracy in temperature control. With this advanced technology, you can achieve precise temperature management for your applications, ensuring optimal performance and consistency in your processes. This controller is designed for those who require reliability and accuracy in their temperature regulation tasks

Flexible Temperature Display Options: This temperature controller supports temperature display modes, allowing you to choose between Celsius (℃) and Fahrenheit (℉). This versatility makes it suitable for a wide range of users and applications, ensuring that you can work comfortably in the measurement units that you prefer. The digital display resolution reaches an impressive 0.1℃/0.1℉, adding an extra layer of Accuracy to your monitoring and adjustments

Integrated Relay and SSR Outputs: The MC901 is designed with both Relay and SSR (Solid State Relay) outputs, giving you the flexibility to choose how you manage your temperature control outputs based on your specific needs. This integration not only saves you time and effort during setup but also enhances the overall functionality of the controller. Whether you need a relay output for traditional systems or SSR for more complex setups, this controller has you covered

Compact and Easy to Install: With a compact size of only 85mm in depth, the MC901 is designed for easy mounting and installation. Its short shell design allows it to fit comfortably in tight spaces without compromising functionality. The embedded panel mounting type makes it convenient to integrate into existing systems, ensuring accessibility and functionality without requiring extensive modifications to your setup

Robust and Sturdy Housing: Built with a flame-retardant housing, the MC901 Digital PID Temperature Controller is designed to withstand various environmental challenges. The water proof, dust proof, and anti-shock features provide a good solution for industrial conditions, making it a sturdy choice for long-term use. You can trust that this controller will perform reliably in various settings, ensuring stability and safety for your temperature control applications

Best OEM replacement digital thermostat for many refrigeration and freezers manufacturers

product_description: Universal Digital Thermostat AKO D-14320 (120v) with 2 temperature-sensors. All-purpose Digital Temperature Controller for Commercial Freezers. Temperature controller Range from -50ºC to +99ºC, 3 relays, panel mounting. AKO is one of the best OEM replacement digital thermostats for many refrigeration and freezers manufacturers (such as Beverage-air & Ojeda). AKO digital controller thermostats can replace 100% of all mechanical and digital thermostats and can be used for all freezer & refrigeration equipment with no limit of equipment size. Included: Digital thermostat, 3 contacts (compressor, fan, defrost heater), 2 temperature-sensors, Fahrenheit and Celsius readings, mounting bracket, automatic defrost timer, adjustable -50F +250F. Applications: Industrial and commercial refrigeration, display cabinets, electrical panels, industrial freezers, walk in freezers, industrial chest freezers, commercial upright freezers, restaurant freezers, glass door freezers, etc. Additional Information: * Range from -50,0 ºC to +99,9 ºC, 3 relays, panel mounting. * Compressor, fan and auxiliary relay. * Auxiliary relay programmable as Defrost, Alarm or Light. * Defrosts programmable by controlling compressor, resistances (or cycle reversal) and fans. * Optional probe allows defrosting by temperature. * Programmable digital inputs such as door switch, external alarm, remote defrost, energy saving or continuous cycle. * Configuration wizard depending on application (8 configurations). Available: AKO D-14312 (12v/24v), AKO D-14320 (120v), AKO D-14323 (230v).
